ResearchStudyCollection Collections of research data including, but not limited, to Consortia, Progra... docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description classifier Research Study Party Organization Type (what type of institution is party) collection_title The collection's title description More details associated with the given resource email An email address to reach the entity end End attribute for a FHIR period data type external_id Other identifiers for this entity, eg, from the submitting study or in system... id Unique Identifier for a table entry institution_id The institution this record is associated with label Alias such as acronym and alternate names name Name of the entity parent_study_id ID For Parent Study if this is a substudy party Individual or organization associated with study period_id Reference to a time period which defines a Start and End datatime period practitioner_id The Global ID for the PractitionerRole that links a Practitioner to their Ins... practitioner_role_id Global ID for this record practitioner_title The title of the Investigator, eg, "Assistant Professor" research_study_collection_id Global ID for this record research_study_collection_member_id ID associated with a member of the collection (Research Study, Dataset, etc) research_study_collection_type The type of collection being described research_study_id The Global ID for the Research Study role Research Study Party Role start Start attribute for a FHIR period data type study_acknowledgement Any attribution or acknowledgements relevant to the study study_condition The primary focus(es) of the study study_design Study Design and Study Type ([example ValueSet can be found here](https://hl7 study_focus The primary, non-disease focus(es) of the study study_personnel Every study must have at least one Primary Contact defined study_status The current state of the study study_title Research Study's formal title website URL describing the entity this represents

docs.title: Class: Research Study (ResearchStudy)
